subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Under the floodlights at Arthur Ashe Stadium on Monday night, the U.S. Open raised its curtain with a grandiose celebration of the event’s 40th anniversary.
snippet: Under the floodlights at Arthur Ashe Stadium on Monday night, the U.S. Open raised its curtain with a grandiose celebration of the event’s 40th anniversary.
